segments.text: I can't believe what I'm seeing; the woman is completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are climbing on that stool, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed at how focused she is on that plate, ignoring everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she's not even noticing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what's going through her mind right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just incredible; I've never seen anything like it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of it soon before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really taken aback by this whole situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could understand why she's so focused on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just astonishing, and I can't look away.
segments.speaker: PAR
